message: You’re more fun than a ball pit filled with candy. (And seriously, what could be more fun than that?)
You have a great sense of humor.

As I walked towards my car in pain, A surprise awaited me in the parking lane, We stopped and had a conversation, About life and its endless creation, Her voice was like music to my ears, A symphony that could calm all fears. We didn't talk about books that day, But our connection felt like a novel in play, Her smile was like the sun in the sky, Radiant and bright, it caught my eye. I couldn't help but stare into her eyes, Like an explorer discovering new skies, Her beauty was like a work of art, A masterpiece that touched my heart. Now I'm in my car and reminisce, About that moment of pure bliss, Her presence left a mark on my soul, A memory that will forever be whole. So I sit and write, Of that unexpected delight, That came to me in the day, And made my pain simply fade away.
You’re more fun than bubble wrap.
You're a gift to those around you.
You're a candle in the darkness.
When you make up your mind about something, nothing stands in your way.
I bet you make babies smile.
Is that your picture next to “charming” in the dictionary?
On a scale from 1 to 10, you’re an 11.
Everything would be better if more people were like you!
You’re inspiring.
You're an awesome friend.
You’re a smart cookie.
You are making a difference.
You’re one of a kind!
I'm inspired by you.
You're like a ray of sunshine on a really dreary day.
When I'm down you always say something encouraging to help me feel better.
Thank you for being you.
